identity.title: Calculating the Employees Wage Based on the Hours That the Employee Has Worked and an Hourly Pay Rate

content.prompt: Construct a program for the payment department of a company to calculate the wage of an employee based on the number of hours that the employee has worked. If an employee works over 40 hours in a week, the payment amount should take into account the overtime hours. The overtime hours are paid at a rate one and a half times the regular pay rate.
